title: Prague 2000
brief_description: This tour of the beautiful city of Prague in the Czech Republic presents the rich history and full range of museums, churches and palaces of Bohemian kings. Beginning in the Old Town Square, we travel across the famous Charles Bridge to Mala Strana and Hradcany to visit all of the famous tourist destinations within the city and along the Vltava River. Highlights include St Nicholas Church, Franz Kafka’s house and museum, the Jewish Quarter, Prague Castle, the Infant Jesus of Prague, Dvorak Hall and Prague Zoo.
